description.narrative: This activity (Civil Society Support Mechanism (CSSM)) is a component of Civil Society Support Mechanism (CSSM) reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £9,911,912. This component benefits Mozambique, and works in the following sector(s): Public finance management (PFM), Democratic participation and civil society, Media and free flow of information, Human rights. , with the following implementing partners: Crown Agents Limited, Palladium International Ltd (UK). The start date is 01-03-2007 and the end date is 31-03-2015.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

sector.narrative: Media and free flow of information
